thread.title: Entertainment Capital Las Vegas Welcomes Wall of Sound StudiosProduction
thread.title_full: Entertainment Capital Las Vegas Welcomes Wall of Sound StudiosProduction | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Entertainment Capital Las Vegas Welcomes Wall of Sound StudiosProduction
text:
(MENAFN Press) Wall of Sound Studios & Production Las Vegas Wall of Sound Studios & Production Owner Joey Grillo Showcase Room Wall of Sound Studios & Production Las Vegas Rehearsal Room #2 Green Room Wall of Sound Studios & Production Las Vegas Rehearsal Room #3 Red Room Wall of Sound Studios & Production Las Vegas LAS VEGAS - Oct. 16 2015 - PRLog -- Wall of Sound Studios and Production is pleased to announce the recent opening of their second location centrally located in the heart of entertainment capital Las Vegas Nevada."After 8 successful years in Southern California there was really only one place we considered for expansion Las Vegas!" says Joey Grillo Owner of Wall of Sound Studios & Production. Besides bringing over 40 years of music industry experience to the Las Vegas valley Grillo is now performing on some of the greatest stages in the world and has created a cool comfortable and affordable place for local bands and visiting talent to rehearse.At Wall of Sound Studios & Production there are three different size rooms to choose from equipped with state of the art gear by Marshall Orange JBL Tama Paiste and more with extra features in the showcase room including drum riser lights and audio/video production capabilities. Wall of Sound Studios & Production offers artists a superior sonic experience at affordable prices that will fit any band or production budget. "Since opening our Las Vegas location in July we have established a steady clientele of local bands" continues Grillo. "National acts have been coming in as well. Last month Jake E. Lee''s Red Dragon Cartel rehearsed here before heading out on their Japan tour. Soul R&B vocalist Liv Warfield (currently performing with Prince) was here with her band for a few days over the summer holding auditions and rehearsing."In addition to rehearsal space the friendly knowledgeable staff of musicians and entertainment industry personnel at Wall of Sound Studios & Production provide a variety of services to clients including audio recording video production musician referral song writing and show promotion. Grillo states "We have access to seasoned professionals who will bring your musical vision to life and that''s just one thing that sets us apart in this competitive market."Wall of Sound Studios & Production also offers event planning full production backline gear and instrument rentals currently servicing casinos and venues for entertainment private and corporate events from Las Vegas and Reno to California. Recently Wall of Sound Studios & Production provided stage gear for a local charity event Pigs for the Kids a fundraising organization for pediatric cancer research. This month Wall of Sound Studios & Production is contracted to supply backline and sound engineers for private functions at both Four Seasons and Planet Hollywood.Wall of Sound Studios & Production is centrally located just off the Sahara exit from Interstate 15 at 2090 Highland Ave Las Vegas 89102. Open seven days a week by appointment only call (702) 371-0811. Check out our website www.wallofsoundstudios.com for a complete list of rehearsal rooms gear and services.About Wall of Sound Studios & ProductionFor All Your Music and Event Needs: Fully Equipped Rehearsal Rooms Recording Services Video Production and more.About Owner Joey GrilloFront Man for Rebel Soul and The Who Revue Song Writer Producer Vocalist and Singing Drummer. Plays Acoustic Guitar and Keys.www.facebook.com/wallofsoundstudioswww.joeygrocks.comwww.rebelsoul.netSee our ad in this month''s Sin City Presents Magazine.Music is Life!
